title: "Due to recent reports from you and your peers a negative player has been punished by the tribunal."

replies.body:
>punished by the Tribunal

http://i.imgur.com/qhMbkGi.gif?noredirect

+1, excellent use of gif.

https://media.giphy.com/media/gsYKROakiJQPu/giphy.gif

That goes without saying.
I was meme'ing, before Laughing Fish even knew what the Internet is.

https://67.media.tumblr.com/9dcd24a0f7e50412e3151d64f388b87d/tumblr_nf7g7zFpqM1t7ugwjo1_500.gif

So you post better GIFs than someone else who posts GIFs...
Um, hooray for you I guess?

The joke. It's there.

http://i.imgur.com/IL0bTB8.gif?noredirect

I know...I didn't find it funny.
A GIF on it's own rarely is. Bit like the one you've just done (as adorable as Holo is)

So you just went and downvoted every comment with an image in it?

https://media.giphy.com/media/FmsOcKwVAFwUo/giphy.gif

What? No of course not, I'm not THAT petty. Some other miserable git's been doing that. 

By all means continue.
https://d15mj6e6qmt1na.cloudfront.net/files/images/1183/3069/storm-troopers_move_along.jpg
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CWzCloeU8AAxQ4T.png

Then I suggest you get some nasal spray, because you're smelling wrong :P
Not once did I ask people to stop. I just made a cynical comment, therefore I am.

Though I will say that you Memers&Gamers are vicious when someone says something even remotely negative. (Even negative is too strong a word)

I eat memers like you for breakfast
https://66.media.tumblr.com/6196a33ee87c06331c70bbfd82cb052c/tumblr_mzk69orQG71sjdczao1_500.gif

EDIT: rood, how can you downvote a Spice&Wolf gif in response to a Spice&Wolf gif? -_-

I'm not enjoying this. I'm gonna go hide under my bed covers.

http://25.media.tumblr.com/aae8a5af995ebb96759ca6ab1614439a/tumblr_mhmajmsE9Y1qf7xduo1_500.gif

Don't be like that.

http://i.imgur.com/j9JH3P1.gif?noredirect
Meme is spelled M-e-m-e. Not W-e-e-b.

Damn, I posted anime GIFs in a related discussion tree.

#Such weeb.
http://www.anime-planet.com/images/characters/thumbs/ang_60115.jpg?noredirect
#Much wow.
[_Meeeeemes..._](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UMtVaPFPCs8)

That's a dank dog, you got there.

https://i.warosu.org/data/lit/img/0061/04/1423222609669.jpg

http://pa1.narvii.com/5718/458e6a9b2e3832c21699e4d25de2a73f85f2485d_hq.gif?noredirect

You will never win aganist the meme vanguard!
But does breakfast eat memers like you?

Because... Stupid potato?

https://youtu.be/WLyaGhSIqp4#t=45s

(I still upvote tho)

As much as I love Spice and Wolf, I've never really heard the dubbed version.

Pretty decent.
https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQPBOLzZNeipHnj4wYiipcqrPwD92gnmWY0KYRijHhgBAhv3X9JbzjMf2A
http://ci.memecdn.com/989/2067989.gif?noredirect
laughing fish's gifs are so forced. i can only imagine hes upvoted himself with lots of accounts every time, since theres not that much kids on these boards

_"You either die a lurker, or live long enough to see yourself become a spammer."_

I think people upvoted him, because he's Laughing Fish and as long as his threads are at least somewhat decent.

He does have threads, that are mostly ignored, because how "_meh_" the content in them is, after all.
The Tribunal is alive?

>The Tribunal is a lie.

Fixed it for you.
The Tribunal hasn't been up since the end of season 2.

> [{quoted}](name=DeceasedL0ved0ne,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ffv9LGEL,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-06-06T01:29:11.231+0000)
>
> Fixed it for you.
> The Tribunal hasn't been up since the end of season 2.

it was around until the end of season 3

The cake is a lie.
Just like the Tribunal
Almalexia killed Sotha Sil. She was later slain by Nerevar Moon and Star. Vivec likely died after the Heart of Lorkhan was destroyed.
http://i.imgur.com/bIjCpBk.png?noredirect
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fi.imgur.com%2FqhMbkGi.gif%3Fnoredirect&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150
https://i.warosu.org/data/tg/img/0382/99/1424971299863.png?noredirect
Part of me wants to explain, but it would ruin the reference.

I once played a game with a very toxic person. 

By the end of the game we had 7 people report him. 

15 minutes later I got the "negative player has been punished" pop up.

I asked him about it a week later and he said he never got punished.

No restrictions or bans or anything.

Don't believe everything that Riot tells you kids.

Because we all know what Riot said about Solo Q just a couple months ago.
It was most likely that the auto-punish system got someone else you reported a long time ago
or, *gasp* hes lying because he pissed at riot
You should buy Ionians when you play Lucian. Not berserkers.
Really now, I thought the tribunal didn't exist anymore

Tribunal still exists?

BLASPHEMY! WITCHCRAFT! BLACK MAGIC! HERESY!
I have reported so many people and still this message has never appeared
I've received the message. I went ghost white because I thought I was being punished.
http://peterandsharda.com/wp-includes/Text/dr.-evil-laugh-gif-i12.gif
Makes your day, doesn't it?

Why THAT movie. The ending made me mad, the rest was decent
Cabin in the Woods, right?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Tribunal Down for Maintenance
Tribunal Down for Maintenance

We are busy making changes to the Tribunal and expect to have things up and running again in the future. Thank you for your patience!




What`s going on
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

never gotten this message, but riot have never told me my reports will be ignored :( i even asked deep terror nami about this and he ignored everything i asked about it and only responded to another topic i replied to them with. theres a conspiracy afoot
When I get these I want to know which person it was that got punished. So many trolls and dumb things happen. I want a link to the case I reported on so I know who go what they deserved.
Anyone else shit themselves when that message comes up?
